languages.text: {n}Под шепот молитв Неумирающему культисты помогают вам сменить облачения и прийти в себя.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: ПОСЛЕ этого куя телепортим игрока из-под статуи и
ПОСЛЕ этого куя телепортим игрока из-под статуи и

languages.text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Под шепот молитв Неумирающему культисты помогают вам сменить облачения и прийти в себя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your cloths and regain your faculties.{/n}
{n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your cloths and regain your faculties.{/n}

{n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kultisten betend flüsternd zum Todlosen, während sie dir helfen, dich umzuziehen und wieder zu Sinnen zu kommen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kultisten betend flüsternd zum Todlosen, während sie dir helfen, dich umzuziehen und wieder zu Sinnen zu kommen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los cultistas susurran plegarias al Inmortal y te ayudan a cambiarte de ropa y recuperar la compostura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los cultistas susurran plegarias al Inmortal y te ayudan a cambiarte de ropa y recuperar la compostura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが服を着替え、能力を取り戻す手伝いをしつつ、教団員たちは不死の者の祈りを囁く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが服を着替え、能力を取り戻す手伝いをしつつ、教団員たちは不死の者の祈りを囁く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}教派成员一边帮助你清理血迹、换好衣服，一边向不死之神低声祈祷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}教派成员一边帮助你清理血迹、换好衣服，一边向不死之神低声祈祷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les cultistes murmurent des prières à l'Immortel alors qu'ils vous aident à changer de tenue et à reprendre possession de vos moyens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les cultistes murmurent des prières à l'Immortel alors qu'ils vous aident à changer de tenue et à reprendre possession de vos moyens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tarikatçılar, kıyafetlerini değiştirip yetilerini geri kazanmana yardım ederken Ölmeyen'e dualarını fısıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cultists whisper prayers to the Undying One as they help you change your clothes and regain your faculties.{/n}
